Clarence F. n/a

  1. Foster Name: Clarence C.
  2. Foster Family: Leonard and Clara Colby
  3. Location of Family: Beatrice, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Beatrice, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: 1880, NY
  8. Gender: male
  9. Notes: Adopted by Brig. Gen. Leonard Colby.
  10. Source: Lesa Arterbrun to Lloyd Castner, 28 July 2010; 1910 United States Federal Census; Otto L. Sues, Grigsby's Cowboys: The Third U.S. Volunteer Cavalry, Spanish-American War; Renee Sansom Flood, Lost Bird of Wounded Knee, p. 113.
